a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Deaths caused by vaccine-preventable diseases, World
The estimated annual number of deaths caused by several vaccine-preventable diseases, based on statistical

modeling. Estimates come with wide uncertainties, especially for countries with poor
vital registration
.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
